subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
Trades (Sports)
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: Baseball’s top two payrolls in 2011 were eliminated in the first round of the playoffs, with each team’s highest-paid player making the final out.
snippet: Baseball’s top two payrolls in 2011 were eliminated in the first round of the playoffs, with each team’s highest-paid player making the final out.
